attributes.long-description: Embark on a unique adventure from the creative minds behind LittleBigPlanet™ with your new friend, the adventurous iota or the intrepid atoi — a papercraft messenger from another dimension with a unique message to deliver — to you! Tapping into the full range of PS Vita system’s features, Tearaway™ delivers the most immersive and unique experience that only the PS Vita system can deliver.A paper world brought to life.  Objects will tear, fold, or crumple, and can be manipulated by your virtual fingers — just like paper in the real world!A different adventure for Every Player awaits! From unlocking the unique message inside your companion’s head, to decorating and customizing how they appear inside the game, Tearaway delivers a personalized gameplay experience.Bring Tearaway into your world.  As you play you will earn rewards in the form of real papercraft elements to print out and construct to bring the world of Tearaway into your world  This item is being licensed or sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America and is subject to the Network Terms of Service and User Agreement, this item’s use restrictions and other applicable terms located at www.us.playstation.com/support/useragreements. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not download this item. This item may be used with up to 2 activated PlayStation®Vita systems associated with this Sony Entertainment Network account. ©2013 Sony Computer Entertainment Europe. Developed by Media Molecule. Tearaway is a trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment America. “PlayStation” and the “PS” Family logo are registered trademarks and the “PSVITA” logo and the PlayStation Network logo are trademarks of Sony Computer Entertainment Inc.
attributes.name: Tearaway
